name: Verify Fix for DEF-015: Electrical Room Light Culling
description: Verifies that the camera light is not culled in the electrical room corner.
testObjective: Confirm that the light remains visible from all angles.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Open the door to the electrical room.
Walk up to the camera to observe the light.
Walk to the far-most right corner of the room.
Observe the light around the camera.
steps.expected: The light around the camera should remain visible.
